mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT r.role_name FROM t_user u LEFT JOIN t_user_role ur ON ur.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN t_role r ON r.id = ur.role_id WHERE u.id = #{userId}

SELECT DISTINCT p.permission_name FROM t_user u LEFT JOIN t_user_role ur ON ur.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN t_role r ON r.id = ur.role_id LEFT JOIN t_role_permission rp ON rp.role_id=r.id LEFT JOIN t_permission p ON p.id=rp.permission_id WHERE u.id = #{userId}
